duties_responsibilities.duty: Schedule rentals and maintain customer service standards with customers.
Respond to inbound leads and guide customers through the rental process.
Expand the customer base by building relationships with contractors and construction company principals.
Educate customers about the numerous ways the company can help save them money, make more money, and operate more efficiently.
Maintain and nurture existing customer relationships to ensure customer satisfaction with the service and support provided by the company.
Respond to and resolve customer inquiries, requests, complaints or other communications in a prompt manner.
Develop new sales strategies and techniques to increase market share and improve customer experience.
